00073                 private function generate_error($code)
00074                 {
00075                         $desc = self::$descriptions[$code];
00076                         header("HTTP/1.0 $code $desc");
00077                         if (isset($_SESSION['error_processed']))
00078                         {
00079                                 unset($_SESSION['error_processed']);
00080                                 return;
00081                         }
00082                         if ($code == 404)
00083                         {
00084                                 return;
00085                         }
00086                         $error = new ServerError(array('code' => $code,
00087                                 'description' => var_export($_SERVER, TRUE),
00088                                 'occurred_at' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')));
00089                         $error->save();
00090                 }
00091         }
